Performances > May 1981: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

– Click image to view.

May 1981: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

Plays:

Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees (義経千本桜)

Scenes:

The Sento Palace (仙洞御所)

The Nunnery at Kitasaga (北嵯峨)

Yoshitsune's Mansion at Horikawa (堀川御所)

The Gathering Nuts (椎の木)

Kokingo's Death (小金吾討死)

The Sushi Shop (すしや)

Fushimi Inari Shrine (伏見稲荷)

The Shipping Agent at Daimotsu (渡海屋大物浦)

The Travel Dance on Mount Yoshino (道行初音の旅)

The Mansion of Kawatsura Hogen (川連法眼館)

The Rear Garden (川連法眼館奥庭)

Characters:

Tomokata Fujiwara (藤原朝方)

Dainoshin Inokuma (猪熊大之進)

Benkei (武蔵坊弁慶)

Yoshitsune Minamoto (源義経(九郎判官源義経))

Wakaba-no-Naishi (若葉の内侍)

Rokudai (六代君)

Nun Joshin (浄心尼)

Kokingo (主馬の小金吾)

Kyo-no-Kimi (卿の君)

Shizuka-Gozen (静御前)

Rokuro Kamei (亀井六郎)

Jiro Suruga (駿河次郎)

Taro Kawagoe (川越太郎 (鎌倉の使者川越太郎重頼 ))

Tosanobo (土佐坊正尊)

Gonta (いがみの権太)

Kosen, Gonta's wife (権太女房小仙)

Zenta, Gonta's son (権太伜善太)

Yazaemon (すしや(親)弥左衛門)

Osato, Yazaemon's daughter (娘お里)

Yasuke, in fact Koremori (弥助実は平維盛)

Yazaemon's wife (弥左衛門女房)

Kagetoki Kajiwara (梶原景時)

Toda Hayami (逸見藤太(土佐坊の郎党逸見の藤太))

Sato Tadanobu, in fact Fox Tadanobu (佐藤忠信実は源九郎狐 (狐忠信))

Tadanobu Sato (佐藤忠信 (佐藤四郎兵衛忠信))

Gimpei, in fact Tomomori (渡海屋銀平実は中納言知盛)

Oyasu, in fact Emperor Antoku (娘お安実は安徳天皇)

Oryu, in fact Suke-no-Tsubone (女房おりう実は典侍局)

Page (近習)

Goro (相模五郎)

Tanzo Irie (入江丹蔵)

Boatmen (船頭)

Kakuhan, in fact Noritsune (横川禅師覚範実は能登守(平)教経)
